DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy Karenitecin ( BNP1350 ) treatment Malignant Melanoma .
DOC.brief_title: Study Karenitecin ( BNP1350 ) Treat Malignant Melanoma
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis malignant melanoma Measurable disease Granulocytes ≥1,500/µl , Platelets ≥100,000/µl , Creatinine ≤ULN , Bilirubin ≤1.5 mg/dl , AST ≤2.5 x ULN No prior treatment camptothecin drug . ≥ 21 day since completion prior chemotherapy , ≥6 week since prior MitomycinC ECOG Performance Status 01 Negative pregnancy test female patient
